channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Display Users
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Display Users

item.title: CVE-2021-24400|2024-08-03T19:28:23.893Z -- unknown -- display%20users
item.description: The Edit Role functionality in the Display Users WordPress plugin through 2.0.0 had an `id` parameter which is not sanitised, escaped or validated before inserting to a SQL statement, leading to SQL injection.
